medical_history.chief_complaint: Shortness of breath and palpitation for 3 weeks.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 weeks prior to hospital visit with persistent shortness of breath and palpitations. The patient also had a diagnosis of hepatomegaly and multiple hepatic nodules made at a local hospital in Indonesia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus, hypertension, hypertriglycemia, lung cancer (small cell lung cancer with liver metastasis).
